title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register using valid credentials and is redirected to the Home screen.

steps.description: Navigate to the Registration screen
Input valid email and strong password
Submit the registration form
Check user is registered and automatically logged in
Verify redirection to the Home screen

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a registered user can successfully log in with correct credentials and land on the Home screen.

steps.description: Navigate to the Login screen
Input registered email and correct password
Click the login button
Check that login is successful
Verify redirection to the Home screen

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify the system denies access and shows an appropriate error message when an incorrect password is used.

steps.description: Navigate to the Login screen
Input registered email and incorrect password
Click login button
Verify that login is denied
Check that an error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials

title: Add New Pet
description: Verify that a user can add a new pet by entering all required details and the pet is immediately listed on 'My Pets' and Home screen.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to 'My Pets' screen
Click on 'Add Pet' button
Select pet type, enter name, breed, and birthdate
Save the new pet
Verify the new pet appears in the 'My Pets' list immediately
Verify the new pet also appears on the Home screen

title: Pet Data Persistence in LocalStorage and Cloud
description: Verify that a newly added pet's data persists in LocalStorage and synchronizes with the Supabase cloud database.

steps.description: Add a pet as per TC004
Reload the application
Check that pet data is still visible in the UI post reload
Simulate offline mode and reload application
Verify pet data is retained from LocalStorage during offline usage
Reconnect to network and trigger sync
Confirm pet data is successfully synchronized with the Supabase database without data loss

title: Add and View Vaccine Record for a Pet
description: Verify that users can add a vaccine record to a pet, view it on the pet's detail page, and receive gamification points upon saving.

steps.description: Navigate to a pet's detail page
Open vaccine records section
Add new vaccine details and save
Verify the vaccine record appears correctly in the pet's vaccine list
Check that gamification points are awarded to the user for adding the record

title: View Global Vaccination History
description: Verify that users can view the consolidated vaccination history for all pets on the 'Vaccines' page.

steps.description: Navigate to the 'Vaccines' page
Ensure the page lists vaccine records aggregated from all user pets
Check sorting and filtering of vaccine records if available

title: Track Veterinary Appointments
description: Verify that users can add, view, and track veterinary appointments, and appointments appear accurately on the 'Appointments' page.

steps.description: Go to a pet's details page
Add a new veterinary appointment with date, time, and reason
Save the appointment
Verify appointment appears in the pet's appointment list
Navigate to the global 'Appointments' page
Confirm the newly added appointment is listed correctly

title: Gamification Points Award and Level Progression
description: Verify that the gamification engine accurately awards points for specific user actions, updates user levels, and triggers notifications accordingly.

steps.description: Perform an action that awards points (e.g., add a vaccine record or veterinary appointment)
Verify points are added to the user's gamification score
Check if the user level updates when threshold points are reached
Confirm that a notification or modal appears to inform the user of their new level or badge

title: Display and Navigation of Leaderboards and Badges
description: Verify that users can view leaderboards and badges pages correctly with accurate data reflecting gamification status.

steps.description: Navigate to the Leaderboard screen
Check the leaderboard lists users correctly sorted by points
Navigate to the Badges screen
Verify that earned badges are displayed accurately

title: Offline Mode Data Retention and Synchronization
description: Verify that pet, healthcare, and gamification data persist fully during offline mode and synchronize with cloud backend upon reconnection without data loss.

steps.description: Put the application in offline mode
Add or edit a pet's information as well as add vaccine or appointment records
Confirm that all changes are saved locally and reflected immediately in the UI
Restart the app while still offline
Verify all locally saved data remains present and accessible
Restore network connection and trigger synchronization
Check that all offline changes are correctly pushed to Supabase

title: Smooth Navigation and State Persistence
description: Verify that navigation between screens works smoothly with no data loss or error states during typical user flows such as switching between Home, My Pets, Vaccines, Gamification, and Services modules.

steps.description: Log in and navigate sequentially through key screens: Home, My Pets, Pet Details, Vaccines, Appointments, Gamification, Adoption, Bath & Grooming, Vets
Verify all screens load their data correctly and UI components render without errors
Navigate back and forth between screens
Confirm that no data is lost and UI states persist appropriately

title: Responsive UI Rendering Across Device Sizes
description: Verify that the UI maintains visual design consistency and responsiveness with correct application of Tailwind CSS including glassmorphism and gradient styles across multiple screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the app on various device viewport sizes: mobile, tablet, desktop
Verify that all UI components render correctly without layout breakage
Ensure glassmorphism and gradient styles are present and consistent with design
Check that interactive elements remain accessible and usable on all screen sizes

title: Pet Details Editing and Validation
description: Verify that users can edit an existing pet's details with valid inputs and that validation errors appear for invalid entries.

steps.description: Navigate to an existing pet's detail page
Initiate edit mode and modify pet name, breed, and birthdate
Enter invalid data (e.g., future birthdate, empty name) and attempt to save
Verify validation errors are displayed appropriately
Correct invalid inputs and save again
Confirm changes are saved and reflected immediately

title: Pet-Related Services Modules Functionality
description: Verify the adoption, grooming, and veterinary service modules display accurate listings and allow interactions such as viewing details or initiating appointments.

steps.description: Navigate to the Adoption screen
Ensure a list of available pets for adoption is shown with correct information
Navigate to the Bath and Grooming screen
Verify grooming services are listed and selectable
Navigate to the Vets screen
Check that veterinary clinics are listed and details are accessible
